column1: Smoque BBQ////Had a pulled pork sandwich here with my friend. The atmosphere was kind of loud and uncomfortable (bad acoustics + crazy noise) and they tried to seat us at a long table knocking elbows with a screaming kid (no thanks). We sat off to the side somewhere else. The food itself was pretty good
column2: but I think we crammed ourselves too full and got nauseous. The bread they put the sandwich on wasn't really my favorite (I shouldn't be eating bread anyway but couldn't resist)
column3: it was like a dinner roll or something.
